headline: Redburn Atlantic upgrades Nasdaq on upside from fintech strategy
summary: Investing.com --Redburn Atlantic upgraded Nasdaq Inc to “Buy” from “Neutral” saying the recent pullback in the exchange operator’s shares offers a compelling entry point for long-term investors, underpinned by resilient recurring revenues and emerging opportunities in financial technology.
